description: Try our easy to follow Kanzi Cakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cake,Seafood free,Apple,Egg free,Sesame free,Easter,Quick & easy dessert
name: Kanzi Cakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat butter, sugar and cinnamon in a cast iron fry pan.
Arrange the Kanzi slices in a circle in the fry pan.
Let the apple slices fry for approx. 2 minutes before turning.
Cover the Kanzi slices with puff pastry and place the fry pan in a preheated oven (180Â°C).
After approx. 10 minutes, the puff pastry will have a nice golden brown colour, remove it from the oven, cover with a plate and flip over.
Serve with a large scoop of vanilla ice cream.
